flavor: A bump and a stumble later, youâ€™re 30 silver pieces richer and the guard is suddenly poorer by the same number. You are a pickpocket by trade, and your deft hands pluck coins, jewelry, and whatever else you want without drawing the slightest attention. Who were your preferred marks? What were your signature moves? Did you have any close calls? Were you ever caught?
name: Cutpurse
